SA07n945:3: sarveṇa bhāvena gurau praṇamya kleśaprahāṇāya vanaṃ jagāma ||1 ||
SA07n945:6: sa pādayostatra vidhāya śaucaṃ śucau śive śrīmati vṛkṣamūle |
SA07n945:8: ṛjuṃ samagraṃ praṇidhāya kāyaṃ kāye smṛtiṃ cābhimukhīṃ vidhāya |
SA07n945:9: sarvendriyāṇyātmani saṃnidhāya sa tatra yogaṃ prayataḥ prapede ||4 ||
SA07n945:10: tataḥ sa tattvaṃ nikhilaṃ cikīrṣurmokṣānukūlāṃśca vidhīṃścikīrṣan |
SA07n945:11: jñānena śīlena śamena caiva cacāra cetaḥ parikarmabhūmau ||5 ||
SA07n945:12: saṃdhāya dhairyaṃ praṇidhāya vīryaṃ vyapohya saktiṃ parigṛhya śaktim |
SA07n945:20: sa tadvighātāya nimittamanyad yogānukūlaṃ kuśalaṃ prapede |
SA07n945:22: puraṃ vidhāyānuvidhāya daṇḍaṃ mitrāṇi saṃgṛhya ripūn vigṛhya |
SA07n945:23: rājā yathāpnoti hi gāmapūrvāṃ nītirmumukṣorapi saiva yoge ||11 ||
SA07n945:24: vimokṣakāmasya hi yogino'pi manaḥ puraṃ jñānavidhiśca daṇḍaḥ |
SA07n945:27: panthānmāryaṃ paramaṃ didṛkṣuḥ śamaṃ yayau kiṃcidupāttacakṣuḥ ||13 ||
SA07n945:28: yaḥ syānniketastamaso'niketaḥ śrutvāpi tattvaṃ sa bhavet pramattaḥ |
SA07n945:29: yasmāttu mokṣāya sa pātrabhūtastasmānmanaḥ svātmani saṃjahāra ||14 ||
SA07n945:32: sa rūpiṇaṃ kṛtsnamarūpiṇaṃ ca sāraṃ didṛkṣurvicikāya kāyam |
SA07n945:33: athāśuciṃ duḥkhamanityamasvaṃ nirātmakaṃ caiva cikāya kāyam ||16 ||
SA07n945:34: anityatastatra hi śūnyataśca nirātmato duḥkhata eva cāpi |
SA07n945:36: yasmādabhūtvā bhavatīha sarvaṃ bhutvā ca bhūyo na bhavatyavaśyam |
SA07n945:37: sahetukaṃ ca kṣayi hetumacca tasmādanityaṃ jagadityavindat ||18 ||
SA07n945:38: yataḥ prasūtasya ca karmayogaḥ prasajyate bandhavighātahetuḥ |
SA07n945:39: duḥkhapratīkāravidhau sukhākhye tato bhavaṃ duḥkhamiti vyapaśyat ||19 ||
SA07n945:40: yataśca saṃskāragataṃ viviktaṃ na kārakaḥ kaścana vedako vā |
SA07n945:41: samagryataḥ saṃbhavati pravṛttiḥ śūnyaṃ tato lokamimaṃ dadarśa ||20 ||
SA07n945:43: tattatpratītya prabhavanti bhāvā nirātmakaṃ tena viveda lokam ||21 ||
SA07n945:44: tataḥ sa vātaṃ vyajanādivoṣṇe kāṣṭhāśritaṃ nirmathanādivāgnim |
SA07n945:49: mārgāṅgamātaṅgavatā balena śanaiḥ śanaiḥ kleśacamūṃ jagāhe ||24 ||
SA07n945:50: sa smṛtyupasthānamayaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ śatrūn viparyāsamayān kṣaṇena |
SA07n945:54: athātmadṛṣṭiṃ sakalāṃ vidhūya caturṣu satyeṣvakathaṃkathaḥ san |
SA07n945:58: dārḍhyāt prasādasya dhṛteḥ sthiratvāt satyeṣvasaṃmūḍhatayā caturṣu |
SA07n945:61: jñānāśrayāṃ prītimupājagāma bhūyaḥ prasādaṃ ca gurāviyāya ||30 ||
SA07n945:62: yo hi pravṛttiṃ niyatāmavaiti nivānyahetoriha nāpyahetoḥ |
SA07n945:63: pratītya tattatsamavaiti tattatsa naiṣṭhikaṃ paśyati dharmamāryam ||31 ||
SA07n945:64: śāntaṃ śivaṃ nirjarasaṃ virāgaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ paśyati yaśca dharmam |
SA07n945:66: yathopadeśena śivena mukto rogādarogo bhiṣajaṃ kṛtajñaḥ |
SA07n945:67: anusmaran paśyati cittadṛṣṭyā maitryā ca śāstrajñatayā ca tuṣṭaḥ ||33 ||
SA07n945:69: anusmaran paśyati kāyasākṣī maitryā ca sarvajñatayā ta tuṣṭaḥ ||34 ||
SA07n945:71: bhaktvā ghṛṇāṃ kleśavijṛmbhiteṣu mṛtyorna tatrāsa na durgatibhyaḥ ||35 ||
SA07n945:73: tataḥ sa kāyaṃ samavekṣamāṇaḥ sāraṃ vicintyāṇvapi nopalebhe ||36 ||
SA07n945:74: sa kāmarāgapratighau sthirātmā tenaiva yogena tanū cakāra |
SA07n945:75: kṛtvā mahoraskatanustanū tau prāpa dvitīyaṃ phalamāryadharme ||37 ||
SA07n945:85: vivekajaṃ prītisukhopapannaṃ dhyānaṃ tataḥ sa prathamaṃ prapede ||42 ||
SA07n945:86: kāmāgnidāhena sa vipramukto lhādaṃ paraṃ dhyānasukhādavāpa |
SA07n945:87: sukhaṃ vigāhyāpsviva dharmakhinnaḥ prāpyeva cārtha vipulaṃ daridraḥ ||43 ||
SA07n945:88: tatrāpi taddharmagatān vitarkān guṇāguṇe ca prasṛtān vicārān |
SA07n945:90: kṣobhaṃ prakurvanti yathormayo hi dhīraprasannāmbuvahasya sindhoḥ |
SA07n945:92: khinnasya suptasya ca nirvṛtasya bādhaṃ yathā saṃjanayanti śabdāḥ |
SA07n945:95: samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tadādhyātmaśivaṃ sa dadhyau ||47 ||
SA07n945:96: taddhyānamāgamya ca cittamaunaṃ lebhe parāṃ prītimalabdhapūrvām |
SA07n945:97: prītau tu tatrāpi sa doṣadarśī yathā vitarkeṣvabhavattathaiva ||48 ||
SA07n945:98: prītiḥ parā vastuni yatra yasya viparyayāttasya hi tatra duḥkham |
SA07n945:99: prītāvataḥ prekṣya sa tatra doṣān prītikṣaye yogamupāruroha ||49 ||
SA07n945:101: upekṣakaḥ sa smṛtimān vyahārṣid dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratilabhya dhīraḥ ||50 ||
SA07n945:102: yasmāt paraṃ tatra sukhaṃ sukhebhyastataḥ paraṃ nāsti sukhapravṛttiḥ |
SA07n945:103: tasmād babhāṣe śubhakṛtsnabhūmiḥ parāparajñaḥ parameti maitryā ||51 ||
SA07n945:104: dhyāne'pi tatrātha dadarśa doṣaṃ mene paraṃ śāntamaniñjameva |
SA07n945:105: ābhogato'pīñjayati sma tasya cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ sukhamityasram ||52 ||
SA07n945:106: yatreñjitaṃ spanditamasti tatra yatrāsti ca spanditamasti duḥkham |
SA07n945:108: atha prahāṇāt sukhaduḥkhayośca manovikārasya ca pūrvameva |
SA07n945:110: yasmāttu tasminna sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ jñānaṃ ca tatrāsti tadarthacāri |
SA07n945:112: dhyānaṃ sa niśritya tataścaturthamarhattvalābhāya matiṃ cakāra |
SA07n945:113: saṃdhāya mitraṃ balavantamāryaṃ rājeva deśānajitān jigīṣuḥ ||56 ||
SA07n945:114: ciccheda kārtsnyena tataḥ sa pañca prajñāsinā bhāvanayeritena |
SA07n945:116: bodhyaṅganāgairapi saptabhiḥ sa saptaiva cittānuśayān mamarda |
SA07n945:120: iti trivegaṃ trijhaṣaṃ trivicamekāmbhasaṃ pañcarayaṃ dvikūlam |
SA07n945:122: arhattvamāsādya sa satkriyārho nirutsuko niṣpraṇayo nirāśaḥ |
SA07n945:123: vibhīrviśugvītamado virāgaḥ sa eva dhṛtyānya ivābabhāse ||61 ||
SA07n945:124: bhrātuśca śāstuśca tayānuśiṣṭyā nandastataḥ svena ca vikrameṇa |
SA07n945:126: namo'stu tasmai sugatāya yena hitaiṣiṇā me karuṇātmakena |
SA07n945:128: ahaṃ hyanāryeṇa śarīrajena duḥkhātmake vartmani kṛṣyamāṇaḥ |
SA07n945:131: adyaiva tāvat sumahat sukhaṃ me sarvakṣaye kiṃbata nirvṛtasya ||65 ||
SA07n945:132: nirvāpya kāmāgnimahaṃ hi dīptaṃ dhṛtyambunā pāvakamambuneva |
SA07n945:133: hlādaṃ paraṃ sāṃpratamāgato'smi śītaṃ hradaṃ gharma ivāvatīrṇaḥ ||66 ||
SA07n945:134: na me priyaṃ kiṃcana nāpriyaṃ me na me'nurodho'sti kuto virodhaḥ |
SA07n945:137: mahārṇavāt pāramivāplavaḥ san bhīmāndhakārādiva ca prakāśam ||68 ||
SA07n945:141: karomi bhūyaḥ punaruktamasmai namo namo'rhāya tathāgatāya ||70 ||
SA07n945:142: yenāhaṃ girimupanīya rūkmaśṛṅgaṃ svargaṃ ca plavagavadhūnidarśanena |
SA07n945:145: śānte'smin virajasi vijvare viśoke saddharme vitamasi naiṣṭhike vimuktaḥ ||72 ||
SA07n945:146: taṃ vande paramanukampakaṃ maharṣi mūrdhnāhaṃ prakṛtiguṇajñamāśayajñam |
SA07n945:147: saṃbuddhaṃ daśabalinaṃ bhiṣakpradhānaṃ trātāraṃ punarapi cāsmi saṃnatastam ||73 ||
SA07n945:148: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “amṛta-prāpti“ nāmaka saptadaśa sarga samāpta |
